data.question: You didn’t come to school yesterday. Where ... you?
Jonathan: Have you got a computer in your room? Lis: ...
Student: ... you please repeat, sir? I couldn’t understand well.
It is not permitted to open the door. Choose the sentence with the same meaning.
choices: You don’t have to open the door.
You need to open the door.
You have to open the door.

data.question: If you have a head ache, you ... see a doctor.
